user.title: Video Normalizer - Welcome
user.description:
**Recommendation:** To get the most out of this integration, it is recommended to have the **Downloader** integration installed ({has_downloader} Installed).

Downloader allows automatic file downloads, which complements perfectly with Video Normalizer to process downloaded videos.

You can install Downloader from: {downloader_url}

Press **Submit** to continue with the configuration.
